metadata.name: I Look For You in The Subtleties of Life
metadata.description:
A thank you piece to all the buyers and bidders from the Hues of Jen "Prologue" collection.

"I Look For You in The Subtleties of Life" illustrates the connections we make to our memories, to places, to people from indistinct experiences. 

3840 x 2160 animation with sound.

The Hues of Jen project is created and led by Jennifer Donohue, a designer who explores the relationship between sound and imagery, the influence of musical emotion and notation. Each begins with something as simple as a cloud in the sky, the inside of a glass cup, shadows playing on a lush tree. How could this image transform from the energy and spaces unseen? Viewers are invited to share what they see from the art. Almost always it is a unique and different experience, just as each of our own lives and perceptions are. How is the art a mirror of your thoughts and feelings? What else can you learn while meditating with it?


The artwork listed above is indeed authentic, created by, and copyright to artist Jennifer Donohue (Hues of Jen); the purchase of this NFT is a purchase of the asset, not of the copyright.
